title._content: Image taken from page 145 of 'History of the Donner Party. A tragedy of the Sierra ... Fourth edition, illustrated'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of the Donner Party. A tragedy of the Sierra ... Fourth edition, illustrated" Author: MACGLASHAN, Charles Fayette. Contributor: DONNER, George. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10412.g.29." Page: 145 Place of Publishing: San Francisco Date of Publishing: 1881 Publisher: A. L. Bancroft & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002315082 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
